name: ctrl+f
description:
A short story based game where you play as a ctrl+f function helping deliver findings to users. Can you unravel the mystery behind the recent catastrophe? 

No time restrictions, casual, chill, story based game. 

Game was designed and built by myself, for Global Game Jam 2021. 
Apologies for the text and audio not syncing quite right, I needed to make a better system to run this but ran out of time.
